languages.text: "Ты недовол{mf|ен|ьна}? Номос не желают дисгармонии и обещают, что запросы станут более явными".
"Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."
languages.original_text: "Ты недовол{mf|ен|ьна}? Номос не желают дисгармонии и обещают, что запросы станут более явными".

traits.locale_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord and vow their requests shall be more transparent."
"Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord and vow their requests shall be more transparent."
"Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."
"Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

languages.text: 「不満か？ノモスは争いは望まない。今後は要求をもっと明確にすると誓っておく」
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: 「不満か？ノモスは争いは望まない。今後は要求をもっと明確にすると誓っておく。」

languages.text: «¿No estás {mf|satisfecho|satisfecha}? Nomos no pretendemos enemistarnos, y juramos que nuestras peticiones serán más claras a partir de ahora».
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: «¿No estás {mf|satisfecho|satisfecha}? Nomos no pretendemos enemistarnos, y juramos que nuestras peticiones serán más claras a partir de ahora».

languages.text: “你不满意吗？诺莫斯无意引发冲突。诺莫斯发誓，从现在起，他们的要求会更加清晰明了。”
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: “你不满意吗？诺莫斯无意引发冲突。诺莫斯发誓，从现在起，他们的要求会更加清晰明了。”

languages.text: "Seid Ihr unzufrieden? Die Nomos wollen keinen Unfrieden und versprechen, dass ihre Anfragen zukünftig transparenter sein werden."
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr unzufrieden? Die Nomos wollen keinen Unfrieden und versprechen, dass ihre Anfragen zukünftig transparenter sein werden."

languages.text: « N'êtes-vous pas {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? Nomos ne cherche pas la dissension et nous nous efforcerons de clarifier nos demandes à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: « N'êtes-vous pas {mf|satisfait|satisfaite} ? Nomos ne cherche pas la dissension et nous nous efforcerons de clarifier nos demandes à l'avenir. »

languages.text: "Memnun değil misin? Nomos, anlaşmazlık peşinde değil ve isteklerinin bundan sonra daha şeffaf olacağına söz veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Are you dissatisfied? The Nomos seek no discord, and vow their requests will be more transparent from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Memnun değil misin? Nomos, anlaşmazlık peşinde değil ve isteklerinin bundan sonra daha şeffaf olacağına söz veriyor."
